DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_PreQuest_03_02: Man, you don't even know what's happening to me here!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_PreQuest_03_03: I am Barnaba, and my whole life is uphill. I don't even get a moment's pleasure.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_PreQuest_03_05: Imagine being chased out of a brothel! I didn't think a courtesan would refuse me service when I casually mentioned my wife! What a nerve!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_Wife_15_01: You talk about your wife in the brothel?
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_Wife_03_02: I had to tell someone! So much misery had fallen on me...
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_Wife_03_03: Eh... I'll tell you about them, but not on an empty stomach!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_Start_15_01: I'll see what I can do.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_Food_03_02: Well, at last, I was starving!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_02: Yhm... Aaa... Uh... Yeah! Look, man...
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_03: This whole trip has been one big disaster. The whole sea journey from Khorinis was accompanied by rain and gales!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_04: To make matters worse, one night we noticed a strange ship in the distance. Those stupid sailors figured it was either orcs or pirates!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_05: Not surprisingly, once ashore, a part of the crew resigned. The captain took it hard, the guy's third day drunk!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_06: I was hoping to at least be able to sell the goods at Araxos, but that fat Lorenzo refused to buy.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_DidYouForget_03_07: 'The crates are too damp!' Of course they're damp! They've sailed halfway around the world for god's sake!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_WhatAboutYourWife_15_0: But what does your wife have to do with it?
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_WhatAboutYourWife_03_0: Buddy, she's one of the main reasons for this avalanche of misery!
My father and his buddy Thorben, they got me into an arranged marriage!
My wife Gritta is still a chit and spoiled! All she ever does is ask for gifts, jewelry, and other bullshit. She even made me name a ship after her!
So that her whims don't ruin me, I have to organize sea trips more often than I used to!
It's a golden opportunity for Thorben to sell me stools and those damn chests!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_WhatAboutYourWife_15_0: I understand that a lot has changed in your life, but that's no reason to blame it on your wife and complain to people in a brothel.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_WhatAboutYourWife_03_0: I didn't ask for advice! But I will ask for something else.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_WhatAboutYourWife_03_1: Lend me 100 gold pieces! I don't have much gold and I need to buy a gift.
No worries, the next time I'm on Archolos, I'll more than pay you back!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_NoWay_15_01: I gave you food, that should be enough for you.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_NoWay_03_02: Eh... I knew I couldn't count on you.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_NoWay_03_03: I won't buy souvenirs with soup, but at least I won't go hungry...
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_TakeGold_15_01: Just buy your wife something nice.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_TakeGold_03_03: It was in one of Thorben's chests. I don't know what it is, but I have a feeling you'll make good use of it.
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_BordelGold_15_01: You shouldn't have spent your gold in a brothel...
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_BordelGold_03_02: Dude, don't even remind me of those Dark Mysteries cheaters!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_BordelGold_03_03: I am the victim in this story, please help!
DIA_Barnaba_SQ418_TakeGold_Choice: Just buy your wife something nice. (Give 100 GP)
